form.name: Date field layout -- Default (Date)
form.author: ggppdk
form.description: Flexicontent fields - Date field layout - Default parameters

field.name: show_age_unit
field.label: Show age unit
field.description: Whether to show configured unit e.g. 'Year'. (Usually it is best to include this into the field label)

field.name: sm_unit_only_until
field.label: Smaller unit only until
field.description: When age is very small, you can display only the smaller age units, by setting a limit here

field.name: append_sm_unit_until
field.label: Append smaller unit below
field.description: When age is small, you can append the smaller age units, by setting a limit here

field.name: append_sm_unit_pfx
field.label: Text before smaller unit
field.description: This can be a comma e.g. 3, 11 months, meaning 3 years and 11 months

field.name: append_sm_unit_sfx
field.label: Text after smaller unit
field.description: This can be a comma e.g. 3, 11 months, meaning 3 years and 11 months

field.name: valid_age_max
field.label: Max valid age (years)
field.description: Ages large than this will be shown as 'Invalid'
